channel.title: Source Analysis on Iiams Family Genealogy
channel.description: Recent content in Source Analysis on Iiams Family Genealogy

item.title: Summary of the Will of William Burgess (1622-1686)?
item.description: The will of William Burgess is stored at the National Archives in London, one of only two wills of Anne Arundel colonials stored in the English archives. With the asssistance of ChatGPT we transcribe and analyze this will to see what this original source tells use about the livefe of William Burgess and hopefully by extension, William Iiams.
